DOC.brief_summary: To determine safety efficacy intravitreal Aflibercept ( Eylea ) injection patient diabetic retinopathy prevention macular edema follow cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Macular Edema In Patients With Diabetic Retinopathy Undergoing Cataract Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Diabetic retinopathy patient risk develop macular edema ( define ≥ 30 % increase pre-operative baseline central subfield macular thickness ) within 90 day follow cataract surgery . Diabetic patient define either Type 1 Type 2 diabetes . The patient must either mild , moderate , severe non proliferative retinopathy treat proliferative retinopathy . Patients must 18 year age old , race either sex , require cataract extraction plan implantation posterior chamber intraocular lens lens capsule .
